name: dominds
description: DevOps Mindsets â€” Sustainable Agentic Product Lifecycle

scripts.start: echo 'Dominds backend runs via outer rtws dev-server.' && echo 'Dev: cd .. && ./dev-server.sh'
scripts.dev: echo 'Dominds backend runs via outer rtws dev-server.' && echo 'Dev: cd .. && ./dev-server.sh'
scripts.test: echo 'Dominds backend: Use lint:types for type checking.'
scripts.serve: echo 'Dominds backend runs via outer rtws dev-server.' && echo 'Dev: cd .. && ./dev-server.sh'
scripts.build: pnpm run build:deps && pnpm run build:backend && pnpm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:types && pnpm run format:check
scripts.build:backend: tsc -p main/tsconfig.json && mkdir -p dist/llm dist/minds dist/tools dist/snippets dist/docs && cp main/llm/defaults.yaml dist/llm/ && cp -r main/minds/builtin dist/minds/ && cp -r main/tools/prompts dist/tools/ && cp -r snippets/. dist/snippets/ && cp -r docs/. dist/docs/ && chmod +x ./dist/cli.js ./dist/cli/*.js 2>/dev/null

author: Compl Yue
